Function Documentation

def web_winsol.get_all_user_path (   username  ) 

Generate a dictionary with all user paths with user_home, app_xml_file, category_xml_file, includes_xml_file, image_dir, software_dir, manuals_dir, html_dir and icon_dir.

Parameters:
username - The User nick.
Returns:
A dictionary with all user paths information.

def web_winsol.send_mail (   subject,
  user_info,
  text_file,
  html_file 
)

Send a specific mail.

Parameters:
subject - Subject email addres.
user_info - The user information dictionary: name, surname and mail.
text_file - The text file name template.
html_file - The html file name template.
See also:

Definition at line 202 of file web_winsol.py.

def web_winsol.create_html_mail (   from_addr = "",
  to_addrs = "",
  subject = "",
  text = "",
  html = "" 
)

Create a mime-message that will render HTML in popular MUAs, text in better ones.

Parameters:
from_addr - From email addres.
to_addrs - To email addres.
subject - Subject email addres.
text - The email information in text format.
html - The email indormation in html format.
Returns:
the email.

tuple web_winsol.urls [static]

Web Interface ## The url List.

  • url ::= [tuple*]
  • tuple ::= html_page, class_name
  • html_page ::= str
  • class_name ::= str
See also:
